Standards._Structure:
The readGOProperty() call would start in this node
String This is the first thing read! If the GameObject_Properties' dataDriven Map already has a property with this name, the GO_Property you are reading will start as a copy of the one in the map. All the other field under this will just custom this standard property. This is also used in parseStdGOProperties(..) to create such standards
Enum (GO.Shape) This is external 'cause it is necessary for both Physical and Drawable components
Enum (GameObject.OnHitBehaviour) __element__ should be replaced with a GameElement name
Action_P
..
Int
This can be overwritten in each of his component. (In GameObject.java) However, should (x, y) not be inside Physical Box the position will be random The default triple is (0, 0, 0) Float Float Float is in degrees.
Enum (GameObject ) {Static, Dynamic, Kinematic}
Float this will be overwritten if the GO has a Resizeable Component. Please Gently Note: if the shape is Circle, only dimensionX will be read Float this will be overwritten if the GO has a Resizeable Component Float Float Float FloatValue If this node is present the whole direction field is going to be overwritten FloatValue FloatValue
Float in degrees
Boolean
Enum (KinematcPattern) Should the pattern differ during an overwrite all the fields are going to be erased.
Box Should the position (x, y) not be inside this area, the position is going to become the center of the area.
Boolean String. All PolygonKinematic objects sharing the same choreography name will share points and will be optimized.
Sequence of "point" tags
Float Float
...
Int
Float Float
Float Float in degrees Boolean
Float, Physical measure Enum (Drawable.Motive)
color tag has an attribute "type": should it be "String" it will expect a name of the standard Colors (as can be read in colors.java) should it be "rgb" it will expect as follows:
Int Int Int Int
Int, can be null
Enum (ResDrawable) .. Int Int Int Int
Nothing.. see animation
Enum (Spritesheets) int milliseconds Enum (UpdateCondition)
Float Float Int Int Int Int Int Int Int Int Int Int
Float Float Float Float
Int negative values will lead to a random priority between 0 and 5
Float FloatValue null value will cause maxHealth. P.S.: this value will be ignored in "MainObj" in al section reading other than the first.
FloatValue FloatValue Boolean Enum (GameElement) Enum (OnDieBehaviour)
Int Milliseconds Int Milliseconds FloatValue
a set of tags, each with the name of the given flag. Value ...
String The name of a standard ai is expected.
Standards._Box: This is the structure of the type Box as expected by readBox() Float Float Float Float
Standards._FloatValue:
This is the structure of a FloatValue as expected by readFloatValue() Float Float
Should (val1) tag not be present this call will expect just a Float with no Tag
Standards._Value: a (value) node as expected by readValue() "type" can be on of the following {bool, boolean, string, int, integer, float} value will be read as specified by the its type

hasWater False 0
hasWater True 1
